ygData.subject: Re: Powerleveling bards (was Cazic Thule Slain....]
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Matt, nothing wrong with bellow.  Except you stop using it around L30 or so.  I havent memmed bellow in 20 levels, no joke.  It was cool and useful in it s
ygData.messageBody:
> Whats wrong with bellow? Seriously, I was kicking butt with that song
> this weekend. If I'm screwing something up let me know...

Matt, nothing wrong with bellow. Except you stop using it around
L30 or so. I havent memmed bellow in 20 levels, no joke. It was
cool and useful in it's time, but you as a bard are much more
talented at other things by L30 to continue to use bellow. But
sure enough I see L35 bards bellowing their hearts out in a group.
(most likely twinks, who dont know any better)

Harm.
